title: D.s thresh
body:
1st of all happy new year riot 
i have a question  > i have zompie brand skin shard 
                                   can u take it and give me dark star thresh skin shard ?
                                                                                                                                       thanks in advance :)

replies.body:
Happy Near Year! ^.^

I wish I could swap those out for you, but I can't. :(   Maybe if you save that Zombie Brand Skin Shard and reroll it with 2 other skin shards, you'll get a Dark Star Thresh permanent shard from it. You never know! :D
